imdb.plot outline: One Man. One Bow. Hundreds of Arrows. Endless Possibilities. Chris Brackett engages everything and anything with his compound bow. From small game to big game, and even things that aren't considered game...Arrow Affliction shows you the good, the bad, and the wild things you can do looking down the shaft of an arrow.
imdb.title: Arrow Affliction
plot: One Man. One Bow. Hundreds of Arrows. Endless Possibilities. Chris Brackett engages everything and anything with his compound bow.
